segments.text: So what are you doing for Thanksgiving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not much really . It's more of an American tradition , so back home we don't really celebrate it . In fact , I am not even sure of what exactly is being celebrated !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well you know , it's a time to get together with all your family and be thankful for everything !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah but , how did this holiday come to be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the first settlers of Massachusetts arrived there because of religious persecution from England and King James . Once in the New World , they befriended an native named Squanto , who taught them how to harvest food from the area such as corn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they had enough harvests for the next winter and celebration ã€‚ They decided to have a big feast for the natives , giving thanks the land , and everyone for the foods , healthy and new lives .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Interesting ! I am amazed how big and delicious thanksgiving dinners are !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come to my house for Thanksgiving ! We are having turkey , pumpkin pie , mashed potatoes with gravy , and lots of stuffing !
segments.speaker: S1
